item.title: How to Write Book Summary
item.description: The Goal The goal of my personal book summary is to connect and embed the thoughts presented in the book into my personal active knowledge. Insert it into my internal structuralization.

item.title: Man's Search For Meaning - Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: Man’s Search For Meaning Viktor E. Frankl Written by Viktor Emil Frankl (1905-1997), who was a Viennese neurologist, psychiatrist and founder and propagator of Logotherapy. Logotherapy is a school of psychology, with focus on the future and discovering man’s life purpose, which Frankl claims is essential and a pure need of a man and needs to be fulfilled.

item.title: WorryDream Climate Change
item.description: article “The majority of the price drop is now due to better inverters, and better mounting racks, and better installation techniques, and better ways for solar companies to interact with customers.
